## Bug Report

TiKV panicked on https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/29bf2ac8f72f737f17988889b2cbfb2eb5e1e010/src/raftstore/store/fsm/peer.rs#L1442-L1445

```
[2019/12/26 07:42:17.689 +00:00] [INFO] [apply.rs:1050] ["execute admin command"] [command="cmd_type: ChangePeer change_peer { peer { id: 2767 store_id: 5 } }"] [index=422636] [term=1557] [peer_id=2553] [region_id=2]
[2019/12/26 07:42:17.689 +00:00] [INFO] [apply.rs:1382] ["exec ConfChange"] [epoch="conf_ver: 81 version: 51"] [type=AddNode] [peer_id=2553] [region_id=2]
[2019/12/26 07:42:17.689 +00:00] [INFO] [apply.rs:1437] ["add peer successfully"] [region="id: 2 start_key: 7480000000000000FF2B5F728000000038FFC5CFB90000000000FA region_epoch { conf_ver: 81 version: 51 } peers { id: 2553 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 2685 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 2749 store_id: 6 } peers { id: 2767 store_id: 5 is_learner: true }"] [peer="id: 2767 store_id: 5"] [peer_id=2553] [region_id=2]

[2019/12/26 07:42:18.664 +00:00] [INFO] [snap.rs:223] ["saving snapshot file"] [file=/var/lib/tikv/data/snap/rev_2_1558_425640_(default|lock|write).sst] [snap_key=2_1558_425640]
[2019/12/26 07:42:18.669 +00:00] [INFO] [raft.rs:2244] ["[commit: 422678, lastindex: 422679, lastterm: 1557] starts to restore snapshot [index: 425640, term: 1558]"] [tag="[region 2] 2553"] [snapshot_term=1558] [snapshot_index=425640] [last_term=1557] [last_index=422679] [commit=422678] [id=2553]
[2019/12/26 07:42:18.669 +00:00] [INFO] [raft_log.rs:519] ["[region 2] 2553 log [committed=422678, applied=422590, unstable.offset=422680, unstable.entries.len()=0] starts to restore snapshot [index: 425640, term: 1558]"] [snapshot_term=1558] [snapshot_index=425640] [log="committed=422678, applied=422590, unstable.offset=422680, unstable.entries.len()=0"] [tag="[region 2] 2553"] [tag="[region 2] 2553"]
[2019/12/26 07:42:18.669 +00:00] [INFO] [raft.rs:2176] ["[commit: 425640, term: 1558] restored snapshot [index: 425640, term: 1558]"] [tag="[region 2] 2553"] [snapshot_term=1558] [snapshot_index=425640] [commit=425640] [term=1558] [id=2553]

[2019/12/26 07:42:19.096 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:481] ["[region 2] 2553 apply conf change ChangePeer { conf_change: node_id: 2767 context: 0A0F0802120508BD1510062A04085110331A0B08011207120508CF151005, peer: id: 2767 store_id: 5, region: id: 2 start_key: 7480000000000000FF2B5F728000000038FFC5CFB90000000000FA region_epoch { conf_ver: 82 version: 51 } peers { id: 2553 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 2685 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 2749 store_id: 6 } peers { id: 2767 store_id: 5 } } fails: Exists(2767, "voters")"] [backtrace="stack backtrace:
   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
             at components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:480
   1: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:481
   2: std::panicking::continue_panic_fmt
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:384
   3: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:339
   4: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::peer::PeerFsmDelegate<T,C>::on_ready_result
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/peer.rs:0
   5: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::peer::PeerFsmDelegate<T,C>::on_apply_res
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/peer.rs:825
   6: tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::peer::PeerFsmDelegate<T,C>::handle_msgs
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/peer.rs:301
   7: <tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::store::RaftPoller<T,C> as tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::batch::PollHandler<tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::peer::PeerFsm,tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::store::StoreFsm>>::handle_normal
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/store.rs:649
      tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::batch::Poller<N,C,Handler>::poll
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/batch.rs:322
      tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::batch::BatchSystem<N,C>::spawn::{{closure}}
             at /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/tikv_ghpr_build_release/tikv/src/raftstore/store/fsm/batch.rs:393
      std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace
             at /rustc/c6e9c76c59e3c10acd63ca9ec157a8894ea1a068/src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:77
2019/12/26 07:42:19 daemon.go:236: ESC[0;33m[warning] daemon tikv exit with error exit status 1ESC[0m
```

The panic is caused by confchange result arrives after applying snapshot, so there is a chance that the membership has been updated before calling `apply_conf_change`, and it may panic as the log above.

A simple fix would be stashing snapshot message if `ready_to_handle_pending_snap` is false, so we can ensure all pending apply results are handled before stepping the snapshot message.
title: Panic on late arriving confchange result
